attributes.action: Abolish this petitions site and divert the funds used for its administration
attributes.additional_details:
Links to the two most-signed petitions below:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/171928

The above reference to a "later petition" concerns the following petition - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/164999 - which asked whether the lack of a supermajority in June's referendum was due to an oversight or due to the fact the referendum was advisory. The Government did not address this question directly in its obfuscatory response.
attributes.background: The Government clearly considers this petitions site an irrelevance. Its response to the 2 most-signed petitions (4.2m & 1.9m signatures respectively) were entirely dismissive. A later petition's question was evaded. Rather than maintain this charade, this site's funds should be used elsewhere.
